stories.text:
I used to use Moleskine calendars or other popular mass produced, cheaper calendars for years. Yet, two years ago a friend showed me a local, polish brand Papierniczeni. It turns out that a calendar can open flat (stay flat when opened) and become a really personal thing.

Do you use any nice, less known brands with interesting design and good quality? I am looking for some brands which stand out with unique/colorful design.
stories.title: Ask HN: What brand of paper calendar do you use?
